Package ca.phon.app.autosave

Class AutosaveManager

java.lang.Object
ca.phon.app.autosave.AutosaveManager
public class AutosaveManager extends Object
Handles timer and performs actions for autosave of sessions. Autosave timer interval is read from a user defined property. Default is 10 mins.

    • setInterval

      public void setInterval(long ms)
      Set the timer interval in miliseconds. Starts the timer if not started.
      Parameters:
      ms - the interval for performing the autosave action. Setting value to 0 zero will stop the timer.
